mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHECKED_TIME_INFO WHERE CI_NUM = #{ciNum} AND UI_NUM = #{uiNum}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CHECKED_TIME_INFO CH INNER JOIN MESSAGE_INFO MS ON CH.CI_NUM = MS.CI_NUM WHERE (CH.CI_NUM = #{ciNum} AND CH.UI_NUM = #{uiNum}) AND (CH.LMODAT < MS.CREDAT OR (CH.LMODAT = MS.CREDAT AND CH.LMOTIM < MS.CRETIM))

SELECT CREDAT, CRETIM, LMODAT, LMOTIM, CTI.CI_NUM FROM CHECKED_TIME_INFO CTI INNER JOIN MESSAGE_INFO MI ON MI.CI_NUM = CTI.CI_NUM WHERE UI_NUM = #{uiNum} AND CTI.CI_NUM = #{ciNum} ORDER BY MI.MI_NUM DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHECKED_TIME_INFO( CI_NUM, UI_NUM) VALUES( #{ciNum}, #{uiNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE CHECKED_TIME_INFO SET LMODAT = date_format(current_timestamp(),'%Y%m%d'), LMOTIM = date_format(current_timestamp(),'%H%i%s') WHERE CI_NUM = #{ciNum} AND UI_NUM = #{uiNum};
